RISK: Risk to a target when a script is used on them. || How likely we are to get in trouble for using it.

NOUL.DOES:
The base for all stallman scripts.
Secretly runs in the terminal
where it's used, spawning a stallman.

ENOUL.DOES:
The base for all stallman flashbang scripts.
NOUL fork but with flashbang.

MEMcheck.DOES: Fakes a memory check program, running ENOUL after.

fog.DOES:
Secretly runs in the terminal, very slowly darkening
the target's screen.
Resets to full brightness after some time at 0 brightness.

sfog.DOES: fog fork but spawns stallman during black screen.

gfog.DOES: fog fork but spawns heavenly stallman during black screen.

sys_key.DOES:
Recursively spawns xrandr, itself,
and disables all user input.
Result can vary from inability to log out to
completely crashing the pc.

RSTALLMANSWITCHEROO.DOES:
Replaces face with the Lord. (backing up
original and sending it to .config.JAIL)

IMPOSTER.DOES: Noul but a random face from thestalledones.

ghost.DOES:
Randomly flashes a face from thestalledones
somewhere on the users screen.

STALLMAN.DOES:
The main stallman script executor,
used to invoke scripts on victims.
Ensures safe and undetectable execution of scripts.
Usage: /sgoinfre/STALLMAN {script name}
